Mike Pence  shuts 1 door, leaves another open U.S.  Mike Pence  shut the door Thursday on seeking the presidency in 2012 but left unanswered whether his choice instead is the Indiana  Eric Holcomb 's office.  I'm open to running for  Eric Holcomb ,   Mike Pence  said in an exclusive interview with The Indianapolis Star.
